Package tage.networking.server

Class GameServerUDP

java.lang.Object
tage.networking.AbstractGameConnection
tage.networking.server.AbstractGameConnectionServer<K>
tage.networking.server.GameConnectionServer<UUID>
tage.networking.server.GameServerUDP
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameConnection, IGameConnectionServer
public class GameServerUDP extends GameConnectionServer<UUID>
Represents the UDP-based server for handling multiplayer game communication.

GameServerUDP class extends GameConnectionServer and processes various message types such as join, create, move, bye, and skybox updates from connected clients. It manages client connections, maintains their avatar positions, and relays messages between all active clients in the session.

This class acts as the core of the server-side multiplayer architecture and enables synchronized state across all connected clients using the UDP protocol.

Message formats include:
  • join,<UUID>
  • create,<UUID>,<x>,<y>,<z>
  • move,<UUID>,<x>,<y>,<z>
  • bye,<UUID>
  • skybox,<index>
